Header: Parents, Teachers & Students Educated on Explosives
Content: An awareness lecture to educate school children, parents and teachers on explosives was conducted at Madduma Bandra Kanishta Vidyalaya at Pilimathalawa on Friday (7). This valuable lecture was delivered on the directions of the Commander, Security Forces - Central, Major General Laksiri Waduge and under the supervision of the General Officer Commanding 11 Division. Captain R.M.I Bandara of the 11 Division conducted this session and alerted the public on security measures and how they should act in an emergency.
